NSCameraUsageDescription: We need access to your camera to capture images and scan QR codes.
NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: We need access to your location to ensure that access is made within a range of 150 meters, even when the app is not in use.
NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We need access to your location to ensure that access is made within a range of 150 meters.
NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We need access to your location to ensure that access is made within a range of 150 meters.
NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We need permission to save images to your gallery.
NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need access to your gallery to select images.
